title: Cardi B., Kim K, Ask Steve, Side Hustle Season and more.
itunes:title: Cardi B., Kim K, Ask Steve, Side Hustle Season and more.
description:
Steve opens up the show and might just be a little aggravated with himself.  Today in Ask Steve, he takes a couple of questions from social media and one from his nephew.  Our good friend Michael Ealy stops by to discuss his new movie The Intruder.  Cardi B. defies doctors orders and Kim K and her legal team are working wonders.  Bangkok, Thailand is making waves as you can now get an instant six pack through surgery.  Summer is known for the beginning of side hustle season.  Sand and Soul is better than ever and Junior may have life changing announcement.  Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO explains how gratitude protects you from negativity and more.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
